about_the_game:
Chicken Utopia is a cute and colorful game of action and adventure with many mysterious lands to explore as you search for the missing baby chicks.

Billy-Bob used wind magic to try to steal the magic chicks so he could eventually sell their golden eggs but instead the winds scattered the chicks throughout the lands. You are a magical chicken named Sunny who decides to rescue the missing baby chickens.

Along the way you may help out new friends, you may open hidden paths, you can power-up your magic, and you might even learn to glide a bit longer with the help of an umbrella.

Be careful though...Billy-Bob lurks throughout those lands with the intention of taking the baby chicks before you get them, however even if he does find them first, it's not too late to peck him or burn a hole in his pants to make him drop the chicks so you can rescue them.

Key Features


  • Help Santa Claus, get a monster truck, explore a world of candy
  • Be a chicken than can use dragon fire... (after eating jalapeño)
  • Explore 12 vast and strange atmospheric lands
  • Unlock secret areas and waterfalls with switches
  • Each world has a new game play feature to keep you on your chicken-toes
  • Occasionally you'll come across big bosses and secret powers to help
  • Rescue at least 9 chicks in each land... bonus chicks = extra lives
  • Opening cinematic and a rewarding cinematic ending (plus a bonus world)
  • Windows & Linux versions with full gamepad / Xbox controller support
  • 15 languages - auto-selected regionally [option for English]
  • Watch out for traps and don't underestimate Billy-Bob

short_description: Billy-Bob used a magic spell to steal all the magic chicks for profit, but instead they were scattered across the world. A fire-breathing chicken explores vast bizarre lands, opening secret doors, and helping out residents, in an effort to rescue the chicks to restore the magic of chicken utopia.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
